title: Inextricable - Novel Updates
tags: Caring Protagonist   Divorce   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Modern Day   Second Chance   Wealthy Characters
author: 西方经济学
description:
After three years of marriage, Xu Xingxing's husband cheated.

After the divorce, everyone felt that her husband's cheating was also partially her fault. The fault was for being too rigid. And only Huai Jing knew the truth. The rest didn't know anything. 
>
